FuncDef: The save ap all-ap command saves all APs' configurations on a master.
Examples: Info: Operating, please wait for a moment.......done.
Info: Succeeded in saving the configurations on AP 2000.
Info: Succeeded in saving the configurations on AP 2001.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To save all APs' configurations, run the save ap all-ap command on a master.
Prerequisites
Each AP has sufficient disk space for configuration file saving.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
After the save ap all-ap command is run, configuration files are generated in all APs' configuration file directories.
